body_html: Very much a "contributions welcome"; @Hibbert-pku has what looks like an implementation in their own github. It includes some nvidia code which probably cannot be merged into the main tensorflow repository, and a lot of cleanup would have to happen before we could merge a pull request.
body_text: Very much a "contributions welcome"; @Hibbert-pku has what looks like an implementation in their own github.  It includes some nvidia code which probably cannot be merged into the main tensorflow repository, and a lot of cleanup would have to happen before we could merge a pull request.
body: Very much a "contributions welcome"; @Hibbert-pku has what looks like an implementation in their own github.  It includes some nvidia code which probably cannot be merged into the main tensorflow repository, and a lot of cleanup would have to happen before we could merge a pull request.
